sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"新的"之意。
means: new ： 普通用词，与old相对，指最近的或创新的。
fresh ： 指新鲜的、新做的，侧重创新。
novel ： 侧重新事物的新奇和独特。
innovative ： 强调富有创新和革新精神。

sentence.Network_en: The company manufactures a range of innovative light-weight cycles.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司生产一系列的新型轻便自行车。

sentence.Network_en: Japanese companies have been pumping out plenty of innovative products.
sentence.Network_cn: 日本公司一直在生产大量富有创意的产品。

sentence.Network_en: For assistance, they turned to one of the city's most innovative museums.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们求助于该市最具创新风格的一家博物馆。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有道学堂 | 双语阅读 ... n. 大肆宣传；使... innovative 革新的，创新的 portray 描绘；扮演.
有道学堂 | 双语阅读 ... n. 大肆宣传；使... innovative 革新的，创新的 portray 描绘；扮演.
CCTV年度三农人物评选_百度百科 ... 良知 CONSCIENCE 创新性（innovative） INNOVATIVE 影响力 INFLUENCE.
training of excellent students with innovative ability by executing student research train program ., 实施大学生科研训练计划培养创新型人才.

list.abs: 消费者分为创新者(Innovator)及模仿者(Imitator)，每位消费者只买一单位新产品且不会重复购买。 市场潜在消费者为固定。
变革者（innovator）（Innovator）出自《机动战士高达00》以利冯兹·阿尔马克为首的神秘组织，其成员自称是完成天人创始者依奥里亚的计划的人…
收藏查看领导创新本词条缺少信息栏、名片图，补充相关内容使词条更完整，还能快速升级，赶紧来吧！ “创新”（innovation）是一个现今时代被论及频率愈来愈高的词语，这也充分反映了创新在现时环境中的重要作用以及人们对其意义的认.
革_百度百科 ... 9. 革囊[ leather bag] 10. 革新[ innovation] 11. 革新[ change for the better;innovate].

entry.def: Something that is innovative is new and original.

example.ex: ...products which are more innovative than those of their competitors.
example.tran: 比竞争对手更新颖的产品

entry.def: An innovative person introduces changes and new ideas.

example.ex: He was one of the most creative and innovative engineers of his generation.
example.tran: 他是他那代人当中最富创造性与革新精神的工程师之一。

means.word_mean: 2. being or producing something like nothing done or experienced or created before;

auth_sentence.content: The Division of Biomedical Sciences sponsors an innovative Ph.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Division of Biomedical Sciences sponsors an innovative Ph.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Division of Biomedical Sciences sponsors an innovative Ph.

auth_sentence.content: Xbox Live, for instance, is very innovative.
auth_sentence.res_content: Xbox Live, for instance, is very innovative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Xbox Live, for instance, is very innovative.

auth_sentence.content: One of the most innovative albums for a while.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the most innovative albums for a while.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One of the most innovative albums for a while.

Sentence.sentence: Those who are likely to become innovative leaders.
Despite its failure to shatter the glass ceiling,Sweden has one of the most powerful and innovative economies in the world.
In the author's view, being equipped with IT products may help colleges and universities build an innovative image.
A number of innovative colleges are making the same offer to students anxious about saving time and money.

means.word_mean: 新发明的, 新引进的; 革新的; 有改革精神的

sentences.en: The establishment of our GRE computer data has enabled us to come up with innovative tactics for doing well on the GRE.
sentences.cn: GRE电脑数据库的建立, 使我们有了新的策略来有效地应付GRE考试。

jushi.english: She was an imaginative and innovative manager.
jushi.chinese: 她是一名充满想象力和革新精神的经理。

jushi.english: The company tries to project an image of being innovative and progressive.
jushi.chinese: 该公司努力以富有创新和进取精神的形象出现。
